dcterms:creator: M. Farajtabar
N. Azizan
A. Mott
A. Li
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset is used to demonstrate the unlearning and relearning capabilities of a modified continual learning algorithm called Orthogonal Gradient Descent (OGD). The dataset consists of handwritten digits and is commonly used for training various image processing systems.
dcterms:title: MNIST
